comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17496774 looks like the General is Brigadier-General C.G.N. Miles, then Commandant of RMC Duntroon...all these generals look the same! If the SMH caption is correct, the pic was taken during von Luckner's visit to Duntroon. I don't think you're meant to have your hands in your pockets when you're addressing a General (!) Looks like this pic might have been taken on the same occasion www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/9470623218/in/photo...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] I think you're right! Thanks for correcting my failed attempt to identify someone :P ha!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] ...if it's any comfort, I found it easier to identify Minerva Lily than this chap...all these generals look the same...probably intentional in case one of them were ever captured by the enemy (!) Psst...just to dot the t's and cross the i's, there's this one as well www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/9470623612/in/photo...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Interesting thought! Thanks for spotting that one by the way, must have slipped past my notice, but not yours of course. Trusty QM! :P
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
